desc: Finish your drink in one attempt.
name: The Chug

desc: Find someone with bigger hands and make a hand-by-hand comparison
name: Big Hands

desc: Find two people the same age as you
name: Ageism

desc: Take a photo of someone else taking a photo of you.
name: Inception

desc: Take a photo of 3 people doing 'See no evil', 'Hear no evil', 'Speak no evil'
name: Three Wise Monkeys

desc: Borrow a pair of glasses that don't work at all on your face
name: Do These Make Me Look Horrible?

desc: Find someone who disagrees with you on an issue. Then shake hands, smile, and waive at the camera.
name: Diplomatic Photo-op

desc: Take a picture with 3 or more necklaces you can borrow
name: More Necklace

desc: Drink an entire beer through a straw
name: Siphon

desc: Have a thumb-war of 3 or more people.
name: Make it a Three-Way

desc: Take a picture with the host
name: It's My Party and I'll Smile if I Want to

desc: Get a picture with 2 bearded men, who can't be smiling and must be flexing in some way.
name: Bearded Men Fantasy

desc: Snap a picture of you (or someone else) sitting on a toilet.
name: Porcelain

desc: Take a group photo of at least 5 people in ascending height
name: Human Incline

desc: Find ten quarters
name: Loose Change

desc: Write a poem and give it to someone you haven't met before tonight.
name: Poem

desc: Switch an item of clothing with someone you've never met before tonight
name: Switcheroo

desc: Find ten quarters
name: Loose Change

desc: Snap a picture of you (or someone else) sitting on a toilet.
name: Porcelain

desc: Propose to someone you didn't know before tonight
name: Proposal

desc: Find a coin minted in 2013
name: Old Money
